message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $95. I believe it offers excellent value at this price point. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save even more. Would you be willing to sell the product for $85?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While I value this product highly, I'm willing to come down to $90. This is my final offer.
I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $87.50?
